metadata.title: CVE-2020-8026 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the packaging of inn inopenSUSE Leap 15.2, openSUSE Tumbleweed, openSUSE Leap 15.1 allows localattackers with control of the new user to escalate their privileges toroot. This issue affects: openSUSE Leap 15.2 inn version 2.6.2-lp152.1.26and prior versions. openSUSE Tumbleweed inn version 2.6.2-4.2 and priorversions. openSUSE Leap 15.1 inn version 2.5.4-lp151.3.3.1 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: inn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
